description.value:
Your character shares the following traits with other gith.

Age. Gith reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about a century.

Size. Gith are taller and leaner than humans, with most a slender 6 feet in height.

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Timeless Mastery. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.9Qb5qxEpGihcGGX4]{Timeless Mastery} You are proficient with one skill or tool of your choice, and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

Danger Sense. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.pa64RhaNz2Bbe7kj]{Danger Sense} You can add your proficiency bonus to initiative rolls.

Gith Psionics. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.txrtMbTfkVriCuOd]{Gith Psionics} You know the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{Mage Hand} cantrip, and the hand is invisible when you cast the cantrip with this trait. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell. When you cast it with this trait, it doesn't require components.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
